text: Mominaharu ho! Juna pavitra, ramro kura timile kama'umchau ra juna kura hamile timra nimti prthvibata ubja'umchaum, tyasabata (dharmako margama) kharca gara ra tyasamadhye naramra vastu dine vicara narakhnu, juna vastu timi svayam lina cahamdainau. Ra, bujhirakha ki allahala'i kunai kurako avasyakata chaina ra u sarvaguna sampanna cha
